text:
Company: Mason, Lawrence and Coleman
Role: Clerical Assistant

We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Clerical Assistant to join our team. As a Clerical Assistant, you will provide administrative support to our team, ensuring the smooth operation of our office.

Responsibilities:

 Provide administrative support to the team, including preparing documents, reports, and presentations
 Assist with data analysis and maintain accurate records
 Develop and implement effective filing systems, both physical and digital
 Coordinate travel arrangements and maintain schedules
 Perform other administrative tasks as required

Qualifications and Experience:

 1-2 years of experience in an administrative role
 Proficient in Microsoft Office, particularly Excel and Word
 Strong organizational and time management skills
 Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
 Ability to work in a fast-paced environment

Perks and Benefits:

 We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $45,000 to $55,000 USD, based on your experience and skills.
 20 days of paid vacation, plus 10 paid holidays
 Opportunities for professional development and growth
 A dynamic and inclusive work environment that values diversity and teamwork
